doc.title: Extra Life
doc.plot: The year is 1979. Our story follows David, a witty New York kid with a knack for winning arcade games and getting into trouble. When street games go too far, he meets Mr. Moran, a pioneering and prophetic programmer-turned-High School Teacher who prepares David for the coming digital world and the role he will play shaping it. But when David's computer skills and curiosity turn games into reality, he and Mr. Moran become entwined in a crime that neither committed.
